Let me guide you through the wonders of wine... The Pét-Nat way.

Handcrafted & Natural Wines

The beauty of a glass and its liquid companion. When you think wine, what do you think? Well for me, I enjoy wine beyond its taste. It’s the color, the smell [a dark fruit medley aroma is the best] , the terroir and the climate for me. The ability to understand wine and its characteristics is a life skill everyone should have. Just the slightest bit of wine education can turn a corporate disaster into a palate pleasing evening.

  • Wine & Pairing education

  • Wine Cocktail recipes

  • Wine games to make it fun!

Meet your wine expert

A lady who just loves her wine! & can give you a lil dapper in your sass the next time you pick up a glass and you EXPLORE first & SIP second. Hey y’all! I’m Amber. A Dreamer, A Creative & of course A Sipper. I enjoy drinking wine while taking in what nature has to offer. I began this interesting wine journey of mine in October 2019 [my absolute fav month!]. This journey has put me in rooms, introduced me to many different people and most of all its a peaceful space for me. When I’m in wine mode (whether sipping, talking or learning) I’m all in. Passion. Come explore this world of wine with me - one sip at a time!

Amber Nixon

Why Natural?

Natural wines fall into two categories: organic & biodynamic. Natural wine is a style that requires low intervention in the wine making process. Grapes and fruits are grown using little to no pesticides and sulfites. Now, as a handcrafted wine maker myself I source juicy sweet fruits and transform them into wine. Let the juice ferment!
